fields.description:
*regression* dows not occur in iOS6
Test steps:
1. Install and run KS> Base UI> Window(Standalone)
2. Press any row to open a window
3. Close that window
Actual result:
The first Table View row disappears. It could be brought back by "Open Tab Animation" from the tab bar and returning back to Window(Standalone), using nav bar.

Expected:
The row should not disappear
fields.summary: iOS7: Window(Standalone) - open/close window makes table view row disappear
